original_text: While Jesus was still speaking, some men arrived from the house of Jairus. He was the leader at the Jews' meeting place. The men said to Jairus, ‘Your daughter is dead. Do not ask any longer for the teacher to come.’
korean_text: 아직 예수께서 말씀하실 때에 회당장의 집에서 사람들이 와서 회당장에게 이르되 당신의 딸이 죽었나이다 어찌하여 선생을 더 괴롭게 하나이까

sentences.original_text: some men arrived from the house of Jairus
He was the leader at the Jews' meeting place
Do not ask any longer for the teacher to come
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 선생님이 오시도록 구하지 마세요
